LanguageData.FountainOfYouthInvestigate: {PAWN_labelShort} is going to investigate this strange fountain.
LanguageData.FountainOfYouthWalkAway: Perhaps it is better to stay away from the water.
LanguageData.FountainOfYouthActivateConfirmationText: The activation of this strange fountain could result in unexpected dangers. Are you sure?
LanguageData.FountainOfYouthGenerationMethod_NearColo: Fountain of youth generates close to colonists
